text: Mbega mwagize kunywesha amadahurwa abari murugendo rutagatifu nugutegeka isengero ry’Imana ritagatifu ringana n’ibikorwa vyabamwe bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri hamwe n’umusi w’imperuka nukurwanira idini ry’Imana, rero abo bantu ntibashobora kungana imbere y’Imana, nayo ntirongora abantu bahemukiye imitima yabo
